name: Tiny Pacers
description:
First 2D project a really short game, controller supported only,  for testing purposes only, I've realized i have to publish a game at some point whether it's good or not. 

Please read the description for best experience.

Art is bought via asset store in unity.

for best experience play with friends/family

controls.

Press and hold X to jump high / press X to join.

Press R1 to float (Pink character only).

Use left analog stick to move.

//tutorial 

Stand on Start flag to start racing.

avoid spikes, traps etc.

Try to reach End Line.

each character has abilities such as :

Frog guy : double jump, minimal speed, high jump.

yellow chicken/ white chicken : triple jump, high speed, low jump.

Masked guy : One jump, High speed, minimal jump.

pinky (pink guy) : One jump, minimal speed, minimal jump, Special ability (tap R1 repeatedly to float)

Best of luck. // ENJOY!
